It looks like you want a GitHub issue template for filing bug reports, right? Hereâ€™s a clean and clear example you can put in your repo under .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md:

---
name: Bug report
about: Create a report to help us improve
title: "[BUG]: "
labels: bug, needs-triage
assignees: ''

---
